data.title: Best Movies Like Tank Girl
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Tank Girl: Cherry 2000 (1987), Mad Max: Fury Road (2015), Cyborg (1989), Six-String Samurai (1998), The Blood of Heroes (1989), A Boy and His Dog (1975), Hell Comes to Frogtown (1988), Ultraviolet (2006), Mystery Men (1999), Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome (1985)
